subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ohio State quarterback Troy Smith, a Heisman Trophy candidate, did little to hurt his candidacy Saturday, passing for 4 touchdowns and 185 yards in three quarters as the Buckeyes defeated Northwestern.
snippet: Ohio State quarterback Troy Smith, a Heisman Trophy candidate, did little to hurt his candidacy Saturday, passing for 4 touchdowns and 185 yards in three quarters as the Buckeyes defeated Northwestern.
